    • 构造器详细资料

      • MenuControl

        public MenuControl​(javax.swing.JPanel menuPanel,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.ButtonGroup> generalOptionsButtonGroups,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.ButtonGroup> booleanOptionsButtonGroups,
                   javax.swing.JSlider spicinessSlider,
                   javax.swing.JButton payButton,
                   javax.swing.JButton toCartButton,
                   javax.swing.JButton viewCartButton,
                   javax.swing.JLabel errorLabel)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        menuPanel - main panel for Menu.
        generalOptionsButtonGroups - String-ButtonGroup key-value pairs. String is the name for general options, and ButtonGroup is a collection of JRadioButtons.
        booleanOptionsButtonGroups - String-ButtonGroup key-value pairs. String is the name for boolean options, and ButtonGroup is a collection of JRadioButtons.
        spicinessSlider - A JSlider for changing int options of a specific suit.
        payButton - Select pay button.
        toCartButton - Select add-to-cart button.
        errorLabel - Show some errors on the panel if some mistakes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isAllSelected

        public boolean isAllSelected()
        Check whether the Radio Buttons has all been selected.
        返回:
        true if all selected.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Invoked when buttons in Menu are clicked.
        指定者:
        actionPerformed 在接口中 java.awt.event.ActionListener
        参数:
        e - the clicking event
